title: Cerebrospinal fluid analysis in individuals with diabetes-related dementia.
sentences: •CSF P-tau and Aβ42 show normal levels in diabetes-related dementia.•Diabetes-related dementia may have a different underlying pathology from AD.•CSF analysis is useful for the differentiation of diabetes-related dementia from AD.
text: •CSF P-tau and Aβ42 show normal levels in diabetes-related dementia.•Diabetes-related dementia may have a different underlying pathology from AD.•CSF analysis is useful for the differentiation of diabetes-related dementia from AD.
